an5.155:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.155:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam na pariyapunanti—
an5.155:1.4: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an5.155:1.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam na vittharena paresam desenti.
an5.155:2.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam na vittharena param vacenti.
an5.155:3.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam na vittharena sajjhayam karonti.
an5.155:4.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam na cetasa anuvitakkenti anuvicarenti manasanupekkhanti.
an5.155:5.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.155:6.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.155:6.4: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an5.155:6.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena paresam desenti.
an5.155:7.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena param vacenti.
an5.155:8.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena sajjhayam karonti.
an5.155:9.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an5.155:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakkenti anuvicarenti manasanupekkhanti.
an5.155:10.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
